Title: The Jialing River campaign, the joining of forces at Maogong
Notes: The poster shows the further course of the March, ranging from skirmishes along the Jialing River to the joining of the First and Fourth Armies at Maogong, which took place at the bridge shown at the bottom. Aside from maps and relevant historical documents, inserts of paraphernalia used by the Fourth Army, including a telephone, a bugle and a pair of binoculars.
